name: CombineHealth
headline: Automating Healthcare Revenue Cycle Management with AI Workforce
description: Preventing revenue leakage in health systems using AI

founders.name: Sourabh Agrawal, Founder
founders.description: Sourabh has been building and deploying machine-learning models for the last 8 years. Previously he co-founded Insane.ai (an AI-powered fitness app) - a seed-funded startup where he built state-of-the-art computer vision models, scaled the product to 150k+ users, and grew the team to 20+ members. Before starting up, Sourabh worked as an AI consultant at Bosch (autonomous driving) & a quant associate at Goldman Sachs. He graduated from IIT Bombay, where he studied Electrical Engineering.

founders.name: Shikha Mohanty, Founder
founders.description: Shikha was a venture builder and SaaS investor in the past. She has worked with several deeptech companies in her previous work experience and has contributed to their growth journeys by providing support on their GTM startegy

# Augment the Efficiency of your RCM Team with AI Workforce
Partner with the most advanced AI workforce to transform your RCM operations
Hire AI Workforce
### 15% HigherCollections
### 60% LowerCosts
### 30% Reductionin A/R Days
### 75% Reduction Claim Denials
## Reliable AI Employees available 24/7
![Amy](https://www.combinehealth.ai/images/Workforce/Amy.webp)
### Meet Amy
#### AI Medical Coder
  * Customizable configuration for autonomous coding
  * Understands medical context
  * Compliant with latest coding guidelines


![Marc](https://www.combinehealth.ai/images/Workforce/Marc.webp)
### Meet Marc
#### AI Medical Biller
  * Handles billing end to end
  * Aids with denial management
  * Consistent followups


## Benefits of having AI Workforce
![Improved accuracy of medical coding AI](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FbestSeller.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Superior Quality
By utilizing machine learning algorithms and natural language processing in RCM can detect inaccuracies and discrepancies in greater detail than traditional methods
![Medical coding AI is compliant to latest guidelines](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FcheckDocument.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Increased Revenue
The enhanced efficiency and accuracy enabled by AI ultimately lead to increased revenue. Revenue is generated faster as AI helps your organization analyze past denials and better adhere to payer rules and regulations.
![AI medical coding reduces costs and can code 1000 cases per hour](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FStopwatch.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Highly Scalable
AI allows medical organizations to expand the number of accounts their RCM workflow processes can manage. Organizations wanting to scale up or down their workforce depending on the accounts can do so easily with AI.
![Reduced denials due to autonomous coding](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FdeleteDocument.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Less Denials
AI enables organizations to proactively assess and identify potential issues with claims before they arise. By enhancing every aspect of claim management and submission, it ensures accuracy and improving the overall review process.
## Delivering Superior Results with Trust by AI
![Explainability is a key attribute of CombineHealth's AI coding solution](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FhiddenFile.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Explainability
AI is often dubbed as black box, making it difficult to trust and rely upon. CombineHealthâ€™s AI workforce is built to provide full transparency and explanation for each of their decisions
![CombineHealth offers completely human-in-the-loop coding](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FPeople.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Human in the loop
The AI workforce tells you when they are not sure and need help. They proactively inform when a human review is needed, thus ensuring that you are in control of all the decisions.
![CombineHealth's medical coding AI learns from human feedback](https://www.combinehealth.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FAi.webp&w=128&q=75)
### Continuous learning
AI continuously learns from your feedback as well as adapts to ever-changing compliance scenario and ensures each of the generated code is 100% compliant with the rules.
## Our AI Workforce Supports All Types of Specialities
### Internal Medicine
### Critical Care
### Pediatrics

### Neurology
### Radiology

## Key Trends in Medical Coding for 2024 & Beyond
The medical industry has seen massive changes in the past 30 years. With discoveries happening almost daily ...
Read More 
## Frequently Asked Questions
### How is AI Used in RCM?
#### AI enhances healthcare revenue cycle management by improving both accuracy and efficiency. It processes tasks at remarkable speed with minimal or no errors, freeing up staff to focus on activities that demand critical thinking and personalized attention.
### What is the RCM life cycle in healthcare?
#### Revenue cycle management (RCM) refers to the financial procedures employed by healthcare providers to manage the billing, monitoring, and collection of payments. This process includes registering patients, verifying insurance coverage, submitting claims, and handling patient billing and collections.
### Is CombineHealth taking the fully autonomous route?
#### 'Healthcare is a people's business'. That's how we at CombineHealth view the industry and strongly believe that the future of RCM is a blend of Human Expertise and AI's Efficiency.
### Is AI going to replace Coders and Billers?
#### At CombineHealth, the future of RCM is a blend of Human Expertise and AI's Efficiency. Our robust AI systems are built with the most advanced technology stack and we strive to power your teamâ€™s work by building a highly reliable AI workforce.
![Logo](https://www.combinehealth.ai/images/logoWhite.png)
Combining AI advancements with human expertise to revolutionise RCM
Mail us at: info@combinehealth.ai

generated_description:
**Company Overview: CombineHealth**

Founded in 2022 and born out of Y Combinator's W23 batch, CombineHealth is on a mission to automate healthcare revenue cycle management (RCM) using an AI workforce. The company, located in the heart of San Francisco, consists of a dedicated team of six employees and is helmed by Dalton Caldwell as their Group Partner.

**The Problem They Solve**

CombineHealth identified a pressing issue in healthcare: revenue leakageâ€”a situation where healthcare providers fail to collect the full amount of revenues due to inefficiencies or errors in the billing process. By leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, CombineHealth aims to mend these gaps, ensuring that financial transactions are seamless, accurate, and ultimately profitable for health systems.

**What They Offer**

At the core of CombineHealth's offerings are two key AI-driven tools:
1. **Amy**: An AI Medical Coder that autonomously handles medical coding with customizable configurations and adherence to the latest coding guidelines.
2. **Marc**: An AI Medical Biller that manages the billing process end-to-end, including denial management and reliable follow-ups.

The benefits of their AI workforce are compelling:
- **15% Higher Collections**: More effective billing means more revenue.
- **60% Lower Costs**: Automation reduces the operational overhead.
- **30% Reduction in A/R Days**: Faster payment turnaround improves cash flow.
- **75% Reduction in Claim Denials**: Proactive claim management significantly cuts down errors.

CombineHealth's AI solutions are designed to provide superior quality through continuous learning and human-in-the-loop features, ensuring transparency and quality control.

**Market Context and Need**

Healthcare providers are currently grappling with issues such as high claim denial ratesâ€”one in ten claims is deniedâ€”and significant labor shortages within RCM departments. CombineHealthâ€™s technology not only addresses these challenges but also positions healthcare organizations to scale efficiently without being hindered by traditional workforce constraints.

**The Future of Healthcare RCM**

CombineHealth envisions a future where AI doesn't just replace people but empowers them. They firmly believe that the optimal RCM of tomorrow is a symbiotic relationship between human expertise and AI efficiency. The company is committed to continuously improving its platform based on feedback and changes in compliance, ensuring that their solutions remain relevant and efficient.

In summary, CombineHealth isnâ€™t merely automating processes; itâ€™s revolutionizing the way healthcare manages its finances, allowing providers to focus more on patient care and less on bureaucratic inefficiencies. You can find more about CombineHealth on their website: [CombineHealth](https://www.combinehealth.ai/).
